content.raw:
I'll respond to both mutex questions here.

My goal was to prevent two system updates from occurring on the same server.  I also wanted erroneous calls to Run to be non-blocking. 

So, there is lock in `Server::Run` to prevent two threads from being created.

There is also a lock here around `this->running`,  so that one thread is guaranteed to set running. Other threads will return.
